title: Tahm Kench Devours Gangplank
body: {{champion:41}} Gangplank can eat an orange for an immediate vitamin C-section.

replies.body: go to your room

Funny enough, he can do just that.

Olaf can ult, in which he rips himself out of his stomach pretty much
Which is **METAL** as fuck
{{champion:223}} Citrus does not agree with me.
We can c that.
get out
Kalista can rip her Oathsworn out of his belly too

FUN FACT:
If fiddlesticks in channeling his drain on an enemy champ and TK eats them (ally or otherwise) the green beam still drains them as he runs around and can help keep them in range for the full duration

The best is when Tahm eats a spinning Garen. 

Say goodbye to your insides!

> [{quoted}](name=i like pie mmm,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=tacp1HVw,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-07-28T20:28:29.302+0000)
>
> FUN FACT:
> If fiddlesticks in channeling his drain on an enemy champ and TK eats them (ally or otherwise) the green beam still drains them as he runs around and can help keep them in range for the full duration

Works on Fiddle's ult too (and Rumble's Q)
And Amumu's tears.

> [{quoted}](name=i like pie mmm,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=tacp1HVw,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-07-28T20:28:29.302+0000)

> FUN FACT:
> If fiddlesticks in channeling his drain on an enemy champ and TK eats them (ally or otherwise) the green beam still drains them as he runs around and can help keep them in range for the full duration

yup when i played tk it was very frustrating
I thought Gangplank couldn't cure out of stasis?  He can't remove a Bard ultimate, I know that much (may be able to now, I only tried prework).
It's not actually stasis, Tahms w doesn't disable abilities or persisting effects and allies can still die inside him if they have DoT's on them.
Catfish quite often consume dead flesh matter so someone dieing in his stomach would be like a treat
Oh, so TK is actually even more worthless than I previously thought.  Yeah, now I'm definitely banning him just so my teammates won't pick him.

> [{quoted}](name=Remlap1223,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=tacp1HVw,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-28T14:19:59.449+0000)
>
> I thought Gangplank couldn't cure out of stasis?  He can't remove a Bard ultimate, I know that much (may be able to now, I only tried prework).

Tahm's Devour isn't a stasis, it just makes them untargetable, they're still affected by DoT's etc
